title: Hospital Management Software
description: A software solution for managing hospital operations including patient records, billing, and staff management.

title: Movie Application
description: A dynamic movie application built with React and Tailwind CSS, fetching data from a JSON source.

title: Restaurant Application
description: A restaurant web application built with React and Tailwind CSS, featuring table bookings and contact information.

title: YouTube Clone
description: A YouTube clone built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript that mimics the functionality of the video-sharing platform.

title: Travel Website
description: A responsive travel website built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, showcasing travel packages and destinations.

title: Weather App
description: A weather app built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript that fetches data from a weather API to display the forecast.

title: Tic-Tac-Toe
description: A simple Tic-Tac-Toe game built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript with a turn-based play logic.

title: Stopwatch App
description: A simple stopwatch application developed using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript with start, stop, and reset functionalities.
